items.title: The Triad of Fates
items.description: Klyx confronts Lyucar. Gron leads the Akroans into battle against Hargot. Endromide suffers the consequences of opening the Pyxis of Pandemonium. Gods and mortals alike look on in suspense as the fate of Akros is decided.

items.title: Solemn Reunions
items.description: The party navigates the unseen passages beneath an overrun Akros to reach the safety of the Kolophon. Gron catches up with his brother. Klyx calls in a favor. Endromide struggles to keep their mouth shut.

items.title: A Pandemonic Passage
items.description: Deadly foes pursue our heroes across the Ashlands and the Phoberos as they attempt to return to Akros. Klyx guides the party through the shadows. Gron leaps to the defense of his lifelong companion. Endromide learns a terrible secret.

items.title: Into the Ashlands
items.description: Our heroes journey across the cursed Ashlands in search of a lost temple to Klothys. The terror and sorrow saturating these vesuvian fields have drawn all manner of evil to them. Can Klyx, Gron and Endromide survive the journey and banish the dark forces within the temple?

items.title: Hardened in the Forge
items.description: Klyx, Gron and Endromide escape through the mines of Mt. Velus only to stare down new dangers in One-Eyed Pass. The party is invited to join two feasts.

items.title: Trials of Mt. Velus
items.description: Endromide, Gron and Klyx journey to the workshop of the forge-god, only to find that the temple is about to be flooded with magma. Will the heroes be able to overcome the volcano’s guardians and escape with its treasures in time?

items.title: Omens in the Flames
items.description: Endromide reunites with their former mentors. Gron apologizes for breaking a dog. Klyx stuffs some lamb shanks up his sleeve. All of our heroes receive dire prognostications of the trials they must overcome if Akros is to be saved.

items.title: Rocky Beginnings
items.description: The newly formed party make their way to the Citadel of Akros, only to learn that their destiny leads them up the perilous paths into the Katachthon mountains. The rugged wilderness tests the breadth of Gron, Klyx and Endromide’s abilities.

items.title: The Red Thread of Fate
items.description: When the polis of Akros is assaulted by an army of minotaurs and giants; a captive warrior, an oracle, and a thief are brought together by the chaos of battle and the goddess of Destiny.
